an3.44:4.3: Yo dhammaṃ deseti so atthappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
an3.44:4.4: Yo dhammaṃ suṇāti so atthappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
an3.44:4.5: Yo ceva dhammaṃ deseti yo ca dhammaṃ suṇāti ubho atthappaṭisaṃvedino ca honti dhammappaṭisaṃvedino ca.
an3.44:4.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi ṭhānehi kathā pavattinī hotī”ti.
